pinyin: Shu4 zi4 Ban3 quan2 Guan3 li3

sentences.english: The case was brought by Mercis Media, Bruna's copyright management firm.
sentences.chinese: 本案原告是米菲的版权拥有者Mercis传媒公司。

sentences.english: Besides copyright, the writer got a 10-percent royalty on sales.
sentences.chinese: 除拥有版权外，作者得到百分之十的版税。

sentences.english: The laws of libel, privacy, and copyright still apply in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 关于诽谤，隐私和版权的法律也适用于网络空间。

sentences.english: WHO exercises copyright over its website and publications.
sentences.chinese: 世界卫生组织对其网站和出版物行使版权。

sentences.english: Do not violate third-party intellectual property rights, including copyrights and trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 请勿侵害包括版权，商标在内的第三方知识产权。

sentences.english: Copyright by Metallurgical Machinery Goods & Materials CO. Shantou S. E.
sentences.chinese: 汕头经济特区冶金机械物资公司版权所有。

sentences.english: She does copyrighting and editing for them…
sentences.chinese: 她还要负责取得版权以及的编辑工作。

sentences.english: As distinct from Rights Holder(RHB), Press do not pay a rights fee to cover the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 与转播商不同的是，文字媒体无需支付版权费。

sentences.english: No reproduction or republication without written permission.
sentences.chinese: 版权所有，非经同意请勿任意转载或复制。

sentences.english: How much do I have to change in order TO CLAIM copyright in someone else's work?
sentences.chinese: 这句是说改了图后便自称拥有修改后的版权。

sentences.english: Suppresses display of the copyright banner and informational messages during compilation.
sentences.chinese: 编译过程中禁止显示版权标志和通知消息。

sentences.english: Strengthening promulgation of laws; Creating with efforts a good public-opinion environment of copyright protection.
sentences.chinese: 加强版权普法，努力营造良好的版权保护舆论环境。

sentences.english: Strengthening promulgation of laws; Creating with efforts a good public-opinion environment of copyright protection.
sentences.chinese: 加强版权普法，努力营造良好的版权保护舆论环境。

sentences.english: Each of these media have legal protection under copyright law.
sentences.chinese: 在版权法律下这些媒介都受到合法的保护。

sentences.english: Huikang owns the copyrights and grants RSH the rights to use it.
sentences.chinese: 慧康公司拥有版权，同时授予瑞星思达有权利使用。

sentences.english: At present, there are some scarcities in Proprietary copyright theory.
sentences.chinese: 目前，对专有出版权的认识上，在理论上存在不足。

definition: to infringe the rights of/to violate/infringement
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
this text/article/the main body of a book
source (esp. of quotation or literary allusion)/origin/where sth comes from
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
